channel.title: Small Airports on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Small Airports on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Smaller Airports, Lower Stakes
item.description: Editorâ€™s note: Hey all, our excellent contributor Andrew Egan is back again; apparently not sick of working with me just yet. Enjoy! Today in Tedium: This is my third Tedium piece in as many months. Though previous articles placed figures on World War II tourism in Germany or the danger of a relatively new aerial sport, the revelations offered in this piece were the most ardently cautioned against by sources. One, who will go unnamed, practically begged me not to write about this while others reacted to the news by slowly sucking air through clenched teeth.
